== Compliance testing ==

=== General Distribution Characteristics ===
''' Due to the wide variety of the hardware, these tests have been deferred '''

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-compliance-performance | General Cases]]</nowiki>

* Processors

* Graphics Chipsets

* Wireless Chipsets

* Touchscreen

=== Performance (Excludes BIOS Times) ===
''' Due to the wide variety of the hardware, these tests have been deferred '''

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-compliance-performance| Performance Cases]]</nowiki>

* With platform in Hibernate state, time from user pressing power on button to desktop UI being fully responsive <= X sec

* Time from user pressing sleep button to platform going to S3 state (not just display going blank) <= X sec

* With platform in S3 state, time from user pressing wake-up button to desktop UI being fully responsive <= X sec

* When the platform is Cold booted (i.e. when device probe, etc is required), the time from user pressing power on button to desktop UI being fully responsive <= X sec

=== Footprint ===
''' Due to the wide variety of the hardware, these tests have been deferred '''

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-compliance-footprint|Footprint Cases]]</nowiki>

* Platform memory 

* Hard Disk use maximum 

=== Localization ===
<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-compliance-locale|Localization Cases]]</nowiki>

* English
* French
* German
* Spanish
* Italian
* Russian 

=== Documentation ===
''' Due to the wide variety of the hardware, these tests have been deferred '''

<nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Cases/UNR-compliance-docs|Documentation Cases]]</nowiki>

* Deliver updated Documentation

* Licensing terms for all documentation

* List of any proprietary documentation which cannot be made public.

* Licensing terms for all components

* List of known non-open source components that will be included.
